subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chauncey Billups scored 28 points, 3 on a disputed shot at the end of the third quarter, and Detroit got past Orlando for a 100-93 victory and a 2-0 lead in the second-round series.
snippet: Chauncey Billups scored 28 points, 3 on a disputed shot at the end of the third quarter, and Detroit got past Orlando for a 100-93 victory and a 2-0 lead in the second-round series.
